AddAITemplate.title: AddAITemplate
AddAITemplate.summary: Adds an AI template for automated review and smart thumbnail tasks.

AddCategory.title: AddCategory
AddCategory.summary: Creates a category to classify media assets that are stored in ApsaraVideo VOD. This helps you query and manage resources in a more efficient and convenient way.

AddEditingProjectMaterials.title: AddEditingProjectMaterials
AddEditingProjectMaterials.summary: Adds one or more materials to an editing project.

AddTranscodeTemplateGroup.title: AddTranscodeTemplateGroup
AddTranscodeTemplateGroup.summary: Creates a transcoding template group or adds transcoding templates to a transcoding template group.

AddVodDomain.title: AddVodDomain
AddVodDomain.summary: Adds a domain name to accelerate in ApsaraVideo VOD.

AddVodStorageForApp.title: AddVodStorageForApp
AddVodStorageForApp.summary: Binds a storage bucket to one or more applications in ApsaraVideo VOD.

AddVodTemplate.title: AddVodTemplate
AddVodTemplate.summary: Adds a snapshot template or frame animation template.

AddWatermark.title: AddWatermark
AddWatermark.summary: Creates an image or text watermark template. ApsaraVideo VOD allows you to create watermark templates to reuse your parameter configurations such as watermark position, size, font, and color. Each watermark template is assigned a unique ID. This simplifies the processing of watermark tasks.

AttachAppPolicyToIdentity.title: AttachAppPolicyToIdentity
AttachAppPolicyToIdentity.summary: Grants a RAM user or RAM role permissions to access ApsaraVideo VOD applications.

BatchGetMediaInfos.title: BatchGetMediaInfos
BatchGetMediaInfos.summary: Obtains the basic information and source file information of multiple media assets.

BatchSetVodDomainConfigs.title: BatchSetVodDomainConfigs
BatchSetVodDomainConfigs.summary: Configures one or more domain names for CDN.

BatchStartVodDomain.title: BatchStartVodDomain
BatchStartVodDomain.summary: Enables accelerated domain names that are in the disabled state.

CancelUrlUploadJobs.title: CancelUrlUploadJobs
CancelUrlUploadJobs.summary: Cancels URL-based upload jobs in the queue.

ChangeResourceGroup.title: ChangeResourceGroup
ChangeResourceGroup.summary: Transfers a resource to a specified resource group.

CreateAudit.title: CreateAudit
CreateAudit.summary: Performs manual review on media files, such as audio and video files.

CreateUploadAttachedMedia.title: CreateUploadAttachedMedia
CreateUploadAttachedMedia.summary: Obtain an upload credential and create auxiliary media assets, such as watermarks and subtitles. The upload URL and credential are provided by ApsaraVideo VOD to resolve authorization and security issues, prevent malicious uploads, and automatically create media IDs (Mediaid) for management and processing.

CreateUploadImage.title: CreateUploadImage
CreateUploadImage.summary: ApsaraVideo VOD returns the upload URL and credential to ensure authorization and security, prevent malicious uploads, and automatically create an image ID for management. Obtains an upload URL and an upload credential for uploading an audio or video file and generates the audio or video ID.

CreateUploadVideo.title: CreateUploadVideo
CreateUploadVideo.summary: Obtains an upload URL and an upload credential for uploading an audio or video file and generates the audio or video ID. ApsaraVideo VOD issues upload URLs and credentials to perform authorization and ensure security. This prevents unauthorized users from uploading media files. ApsaraVideo VOD generates media IDs, video IDs, and image IDs together with upload URLs and credentials. Media IDs are used in lifecycle management and media processing.

DecryptKMSDataKey.title: DecryptKMSDataKey
DecryptKMSDataKey.summary: Decrypts the ciphertext specified by CiphertextBlob in the Key Management Service (KMS) data key.

DeleteAIImageInfos.title: DeleteAIImageInfos
DeleteAIImageInfos.summary: Deletes the information about one or more images that are submitted for AI processing.

DeleteAttachedMedia.title: DeleteAttachedMedia
DeleteAttachedMedia.summary: Deletes auxiliary media assets from ApsaraVideo VOD. You can delete one or more auxiliary media assets such as watermark images, subtitle files, and materials in a batch.

DeleteCategory.title: DeleteCategory
DeleteCategory.summary: Deletes a category and its subcategories.

DeleteDynamicImage.title: DeleteDynamicImage
DeleteDynamicImage.summary: Deletes the information about animated stickers.

DeleteEditingProjectMaterials.title: DeleteEditingProjectMaterials
DeleteEditingProjectMaterials.summary: Deletes the materials to be edited for an online editing project.

DeleteImage.title: DeleteImage
DeleteImage.summary: Deletes uploaded images and video snapshots that are automatically captured.

DeleteMessageCallback.title: DeleteMessageCallback
DeleteMessageCallback.summary: Deletes the callback method, callback URL, and event type of an event notification.

DeleteMezzanines.title: DeleteMezzanines
DeleteMezzanines.summary: Deletes one or more source files at a time.

DeleteMultipartUpload.title: DeleteMultipartUpload
DeleteMultipartUpload.summary: Deletes the parts generated during an upload.

DeleteStream.title: DeleteStream
DeleteStream.summary: Deletes media streams such as video or audio streams and their storage files.

DeleteTranscodeTemplateGroup.title: DeleteTranscodeTemplateGroup
DeleteTranscodeTemplateGroup.summary: Deletes one or more transcoding templates from a transcoding template group or forcibly deletes a transcoding template group.

DeleteVideo.title: DeleteVideo
DeleteVideo.summary: Deletes one or more videos at a time, including their mezzanine files, transcoded stream files, and thumbnail snapshots.

DeleteVodDomain.title: DeleteVodDomain
DeleteVodDomain.summary: Removes a domain name for CDN from ApsaraVideo VOD.

DeleteVodSpecificConfig.title: DeleteVodSpecificConfig
DeleteVodSpecificConfig.summary: Deletes the configurations of a domain name for CDN.

DeleteWatermark.title: DeleteWatermark
DeleteWatermark.summary: Deletes an image watermark or text watermark template.

DescribeMediaDistribution.title: DescribeMediaDistribution
DescribeMediaDistribution.summary: Queries the distribution of media asset data by time. The maximum time range to query is 6 months.

DescribePlayTopVideos.title: DescribePlayTopVideos
DescribePlayTopVideos.summary: Queries daily playback statistics on top videos, including video views, unique visitors, and total playback duration.

DescribePlayUserAvg.title: DescribePlayUserAvg
DescribePlayUserAvg.summary: Queries the statistics on average playback each day in a specified time range.

DescribePlayUserTotal.title: DescribePlayUserTotal
DescribePlayUserTotal.summary: Queries the daily playback statistics in a specified time range. The playback statistics include the total number of views, total number of viewers, total playback duration, and playback duration distribution.

DescribePlayVideoStatis.title: DescribePlayVideoStatis
DescribePlayVideoStatis.summary: Queries daily playback statistics on a video in the specified time range.

DescribeVodAIData.title: DescribeVodAIData
DescribeVodAIData.summary: Queries the statistics on video AI of different types, such as automated review and media fingerprinting.

DescribeVodCertificateList.title: DescribeVodCertificateList
DescribeVodCertificateList.summary: Queries the certificates of a specified domain name for CDN or all the domain names for CDN within your Alibaba Cloud account.

DescribeVodDomainBpsData.title: DescribeVodDomainBpsData
DescribeVodDomainBpsData.summary: Queries the bandwidth for one or more specified domain names for CDN.

DescribeVodDomainBpsDataByLayer.title: DescribeVodDomainBpsDataByLayer
DescribeVodDomainBpsDataByLayer.summary: Queries the bandwidth data for one or more accelerated domain names by the protocol type.

DescribeVodDomainCertificateInfo.title: DescribeVodDomainCertificateInfo
DescribeVodDomainCertificateInfo.summary: Queries the certificate information about an accelerated domain name.

DescribeVodDomainConfigs.title: DescribeVodDomainConfigs
DescribeVodDomainConfigs.summary: Queries the configurations of a domain name for CDN. You can query the configurations of multiple features at a time.

DescribeVodDomainDetail.title: DescribeVodDomainDetail
DescribeVodDomainDetail.summary: Queries the basic information about a specified domain name for CDN.

DescribeVodDomainHitRateData.title: DescribeVodDomainHitRateData
DescribeVodDomainHitRateData.summary: Queries the byte hit ratios of accelerated domain names. Byte hit ratios are measured in percentage.

DescribeVodDomainLog.title: DescribeVodDomainLog
DescribeVodDomainLog.summary: Queries the information about the CDN access logs for a domain name, including the log path.

DescribeVodDomainMax95BpsData.title: DescribeVodDomainMax95BpsData
DescribeVodDomainMax95BpsData.summary: Queries the 95th percentile bandwidth data of an accelerated domain name.

DescribeVodDomainQpsData.title: DescribeVodDomainQpsData
DescribeVodDomainQpsData.summary: Queries the number of queries per second (QPS) for one or more accelerated domain names. Data is collected every 5 minutes. You can query data collected in the last 90 days.

DescribeVodDomainRealTimeBpsData.title: DescribeVodDomainRealTimeBpsData
DescribeVodDomainRealTimeBpsData.summary: Queries the bandwidth data for one or more accelerated domains. The minimum time granularity is 1 minute. The minimum data latency is 5 minutes. You can query data in the last 186 days. Compared with the DescribeVodDomainBpsData operation, this operation provides a smaller time granularity, lower data latency, and allows you to query historical data within a shorter time period.

DescribeVodDomainRealTimeByteHitRateData.title: DescribeVodDomainRealTimeByteHitRateData
DescribeVodDomainRealTimeByteHitRateData.summary: Queries the byte hit ratio for one or more accelerated domains. The minimum time granularity is 1 minute. The minimum data latency is 5 minutes. You can query data in the last 186 days.

DescribeVodDomainRealTimeDetailData.title: DescribeVodDomainRealTimeDetailData
DescribeVodDomainRealTimeDetailData.summary: Queries real-time monitoring data of one or more accelerated domain names.

DescribeVodDomainRealTimeHttpCodeData.title: DescribeVodDomainRealTimeHttpCodeData
DescribeVodDomainRealTimeHttpCodeData.summary: Queries the total number of HTTP status codes and proportion of each HTTP status code for one or more accelerated domains. The minimum time granularity is 1 minute. The minimum data latency is 5 minutes. You can query data in the last 186 days.

DescribeVodDomainRealTimeQpsData.title: DescribeVodDomainRealTimeQpsData
DescribeVodDomainRealTimeQpsData.summary: Queries the number of queries per second (QPS) for one or more accelerated domains. The minimum time granularity is 1 minute. The minimum data latency is 5 minutes. You can query data in the last 186 days.

DescribeVodDomainRealTimeReqHitRateData.title: DescribeVodDomainRealTimeReqHitRateData
DescribeVodDomainRealTimeReqHitRateData.summary: Queries the request hit ratio data for one or more accelerated domain names. The minimum time granularity is 1 minute. The minimum data latency is 5 minutes. You can query data in the last 186 days.

DescribeVodDomainRealTimeTrafficData.title: DescribeVodDomainRealTimeTrafficData
DescribeVodDomainRealTimeTrafficData.summary: Queries the traffic data for one or more accelerated domains. The minimum time granularity is 1 minute. The minimum data latency is 5 minutes. You can query data in the last 186 days. Compared with the DescribeVodDomainTrafficData operation, this operation provides a smaller time granularity, lower data latency, and allows you to query historical data within a shorter time period.

DescribeVodDomainReqHitRateData.title: DescribeVodDomainReqHitRateData
DescribeVodDomainReqHitRateData.summary: Queries the byte hit ratio for one or more accelerated domains. Request hit ratios are measured in percentage.

DescribeVodDomainSrcBpsData.title: DescribeVodDomainSrcBpsData
DescribeVodDomainSrcBpsData.summary: Queries the bandwidth data during back-to-origin routing for one or more accelerated domain names.

DescribeVodDomainSrcTrafficData.title: DescribeVodDomainSrcTrafficData
DescribeVodDomainSrcTrafficData.summary: Queries origin traffic data for accelerated domain names in ApsaraVideo VOD. The traffic is measured in bytes.

DescribeVodDomainTrafficData.title: DescribeVodDomainTrafficData
DescribeVodDomainTrafficData.summary: Queries the traffic data for one or more accelerated domains. The minimum time granularity is 5 minutes. You can query data in the last 366 days. Compared with the DescribeVodDomainRealTimeTrafficData operation, this operation provides a greater time granularity, higher data latency, but allows you to query historical data within a longer time period.

DescribeVodDomainUsageData.title: DescribeVodDomainUsageData
DescribeVodDomainUsageData.summary: Queries the traffic or bandwidth data of one or more accelerated domain names.

DescribeVodEditingUsageData.title: DescribeVodEditingUsageData
DescribeVodEditingUsageData.summary: Queries the online editing usage in ApsaraVideo VOD.

DescribeVodMediaPlayData.title: DescribeVodMediaPlayData
DescribeVodMediaPlayData.summary: Queries the playback statistics based on the media ID. You can call this operation to query information such as the number of visits, average video views per viewer, total number of views, average playback duration per viewer, and total playback duration.

DescribeVodRangeDataByLocateAndIspServic.title: DescribeVodRangeDataByLocateAndIspService
DescribeVodRangeDataByLocateAndIspServic.summary: Queries the bandwidth data by Internet service provider (ISP) and region.

DescribeVodRefreshQuota.title: DescribeVodRefreshQuota
DescribeVodRefreshQuota.summary: Queries the maximum number and remaining number of requests to refresh or prefetch files on the current day. You can prefetch files based on URLs and refresh files based on URLs or directories.

DescribeVodRefreshTasks.title: DescribeVodRefreshTasks
DescribeVodRefreshTasks.summary: Queries the information about one or more refresh or prefetch tasks.

DescribeVodSSLCertificateList.title: DescribeVodSSLCertificateList
DescribeVodSSLCertificateList.summary: Queries the certificates by domain name.

DescribeVodStorageData.title: DescribeVodStorageData
DescribeVodStorageData.summary: Queries the usage of storage-related resources, including the storage volume and outbound traffic.

DescribeVodTieringStorageData.title: DescribeVodTieringStorageData
DescribeVodTieringStorageData.summary: Queries the usage of tiered storage for media assets.

DescribeVodTieringStorageRetrievalData.title: DescribeVodTieringStorageRetrievalData
DescribeVodTieringStorageRetrievalData.summary: Queries the data retrieval from tiered storage.

DescribeVodUserDomains.title: DescribeVodUserDomains
DescribeVodUserDomains.summary: Queries the domain names for CDN within your Alibaba Cloud account.

DetachAppPolicyFromIdentity.title: DetachAppPolicyFromIdentity
DetachAppPolicyFromIdentity.summary: Revokes application permissions from the specified identity. The identity may a RAM user or RAM role.

GenerateDownloadSecretKey.title: GenerateDownloadSecretKey
GenerateDownloadSecretKey.summary: Generates a key for secure download. ApsaraVideo Player SDK provides the secure download feature. Videos that are downloaded to your local device in this mode are encrypted. You can play the encrypted videos only by using the key file generated from the app that you specified. Secure download protects your videos from malicious playback or distribution.

GenerateKMSDataKey.title: GenerateKMSDataKey
GenerateKMSDataKey.summary: Generates a random Key Management Service (KMS) data key used for HLS encryption in ApsaraVideo VOD.

GetAIImageJobs.title: GetAIImageJobs
GetAIImageJobs.summary: Queries jobs of image AI processing.

GetAIMediaAuditJob.title: GetAIMediaAuditJob
GetAIMediaAuditJob.summary: Queries the information about an intelligent review job. After the job is submitted, it is processed asynchronously. You can call this operation to query the job information in real time.

GetAIVideoTagResult.title: GetAIVideoTagResult
GetAIVideoTagResult.summary: Queries the results of smart tagging jobs.

GetAppInfos.title: GetAppInfos
GetAppInfos.summary: Queries the information about one or more applications based on application IDs.

GetAttachedMediaInfo.title: GetAttachedMediaInfo
GetAttachedMediaInfo.summary: Queries the URL and basic information about one or more auxiliary media assets such as watermark images, subtitle files, and materials based on IDs.

GetCategories.title: GetCategories
GetCategories.summary: Queries the information about a specific category and its subcategories based on the ID or type of the category.

GetDailyPlayRegionStatis.title: GetDailyPlayRegionStatis
GetDailyPlayRegionStatis.summary: Obtains all media traffic data of a specific date and region. The data is generated based on Alibaba Cloud CDN traffic logs and reflects the traffic consumption of videos. The data is exported as a CSV file, including the date, video ID, domain name, traffic, application ID, and category ID. You can download the file to your local storage for operational data analysis and billing.

GetDigitalWatermarkExtractResult.title: GetDigitalWatermarkExtractResult
GetDigitalWatermarkExtractResult.summary: Queries the results of a digital watermark extraction job. You can call this operation to obtain information such as the job status and the content of the copyright or user-tracing watermark.

GetEditingProject.title: GetEditingProject
GetEditingProject.summary: Queries the details of an online editing project.

GetEditingProjectMaterials.title: GetEditingProjectMaterials
GetEditingProjectMaterials.summary: Queries materials that are waiting to be edited in an online editing project.

GetImageInfo.title: GetImageInfo
GetImageInfo.summary: Queries the basic information and URL of an image based on the image ID after you upload the image to ApsaraVideo VOD.

GetImageInfos.title: GetImageInfos
GetImageInfos.summary: Queries the basic information about multiple images at a time.

GetJobDetail.title: GetJobDetail
GetJobDetail.summary: Queries the details of an asynchronous task based on jobId.

GetMediaAuditAudioResultDetail.title: GetMediaAuditAudioResultDetail
GetMediaAuditAudioResultDetail.summary: Queries the details of audio review results.

GetMediaAuditResult.title: GetMediaAuditResult
GetMediaAuditResult.summary: Queries the summary of automated review results.

GetMediaAuditResultDetail.title: GetMediaAuditResultDetail
GetMediaAuditResultDetail.summary: Queries the details of automated review results. You can call this operation to query the details of review results in real time.

GetMediaAuditResultTimeline.title: GetMediaAuditResultTimeline
GetMediaAuditResultTimeline.summary: Queries the timelines of all snapshots that violate content regulations.

GetMediaDNAResult.title: GetMediaDNAResult
GetMediaDNAResult.summary: Queries the results of video fingerprinting jobs. After a media fingerprinting job is complete, you can call this operation to query the media fingerprinting result.

GetMediaRefreshJobs.title: GetMediaRefreshJobs
GetMediaRefreshJobs.summary: Queries the information about media refresh or prefetch jobs, such as the job status and filtering conditions.

GetMessageCallback.title: GetMessageCallback
GetMessageCallback.summary: Queries the callback method, callback URL, and event type of an event notification.

GetMezzanineInfo.title: GetMezzanineInfo
GetMezzanineInfo.summary: Queries the information about the mezzanine file of an audio or video. The information includes the mezzanine file URL, resolution, and bitrate of the audio or video.

GetPlayInfo.title: GetPlayInfo
GetPlayInfo.summary: Obtains the playback URL by the audio or video ID. Then, you can use ApsaraVideo Player or a third-party player, such as a system player, open source player, orself-developed player, to play the audio or video.

GetTranscodeSummary.title: GetTranscodeSummary
GetTranscodeSummary.summary: Queries transcoding summaries of audio and video files based on the file ID. A transcoding summary includes the status and progress of transcoding.

GetTranscodeTask.title: GetTranscodeTask
GetTranscodeTask.summary: Queries details about transcoding jobs based on the transcoding task ID.

GetTranscodeTemplateGroup.title: GetTranscodeTemplateGroup
GetTranscodeTemplateGroup.summary: Queries the details of a transcoding template group based on the template group ID.

GetURLUploadInfos.title: GetURLUploadInfos
GetURLUploadInfos.summary: Queries the information about URL-based upload jobs.

GetUploadDetails.title: GetUploadDetails
GetUploadDetails.summary: Queries the upload details, such as the upload time, upload ratio, and upload source, about one or more media files based on the media IDs.

GetVideoInfo.title: GetVideoInfo
GetVideoInfo.summary: Obtains the title, description, duration, thumbnail URL, status, creation time, size, snapshots, category, and tags of a media file based on the file ID.

GetVideoInfos.title: GetVideoInfos
GetVideoInfos.summary: Queries information such as the title, description, duration, thumbnail URL, status, creation time, size, snapshots, category, and tags about multiple audio or video files based on IDs.

GetVideoPlayAuth.title: GetVideoPlayAuth
GetVideoPlayAuth.summary: Queries the credential required for media playback. ApsaraVideo Player SDK automatically obtains the playback URL based on the playback credential. Each playback credential can be used to obtain the playback URL only for a specific video in a specific period of time. You cannot obtain the playback URL if the credential expires or is incorrect. You can use PlayAuth-based playback when you require high security for audio and video playback.

GetVodTemplate.title: GetVodTemplate
GetVodTemplate.summary: Queries details of a snapshot template.

GetWatermark.title: GetWatermark
GetWatermark.summary: Queries the configurations of an image or text watermark template based on tits ID. You can call this operation to obtain information such as the position, size, and display time of an image watermark or the content, position, font, and font color of a text watermark.

ListAIImageInfo.title: ListAIImageInfo
ListAIImageInfo.summary: Queries the AI processing results about the images of a specified video.

ListAIJob.title: ListAIJob
ListAIJob.summary: Queries a smart tagging or video fingerprinting job. After you submit a smart tagging or video fingerprinting job, ApsaraVideo VOD asynchronously processes the job. You can call this operation to query the job information in real time.

ListAppInfo.title: ListAppInfo
ListAppInfo.summary: Queries the applications that you are authorized to manage based on query conditions.

ListAppPoliciesForIdentity.title: ListAppPoliciesForIdentity
ListAppPoliciesForIdentity.summary: Queries the application policies that are attached to the specified identity. The identity may be a RAM user or RAM role.

ListAuditSecurityIp.title: ListAuditSecurityIp
ListAuditSecurityIp.summary: Queries the IP addresses in a security group.

ListDynamicImage.title: ListDynamicImage
ListDynamicImage.summary: Queries the information about animated images of a video based on the video ID.

ListJobInfo.title: ListJobInfo
ListJobInfo.summary: Queries historical tasks based on the media asset ID.

ListSnapshots.title: ListSnapshots
ListSnapshots.summary: Queries snapshots that were captured by submitting snapshot jobs or the thumbnail that was generated by the system when you uploaded a video.

ListTranscodeTask.title: ListTranscodeTask
ListTranscodeTask.summary: Queries transcoding tasks based on the media ID. This operation does not return specific job information.

ListWatermark.title: ListWatermark
ListWatermark.summary: Queries the configuration information about all image and text watermark templates in a region. You can call this operation to obtain information such as the position, size, and display time of image watermarks or the content, position, font, and font color of text watermarks.

MoveAppResource.title: MoveAppResource
MoveAppResource.summary: Migrates resources between applications. The application administrator can directly migrate resources between applications. Resource Access Management (RAM) users or RAM roles must obtain the write permissions on the source and destination applications before they migrate resources between applications. Multiple resources can be migrated at a time.

PreloadVodObjectCaches.title: PreloadVodObjectCaches
PreloadVodObjectCaches.summary: Prefetches resources from an origin server to L2 nodes. Users can directly hit the cache upon their first visits. This way, workloads on the origin server can be reduced.

ProduceEditingProjectVideo.title: ProduceEditingProjectVideo
ProduceEditingProjectVideo.summary: Produces a video from one or more source files. You can directly specify source files by configuring the Timeline parameter. Alternatively, you can specify source files after you create an online editing project.

RefreshMediaPlayUrls.title: RefreshMediaPlayUrls
RefreshMediaPlayUrls.summary: Submits media refresh or prefetch tasks based on the media IDs.

RefreshUploadVideo.title: RefreshUploadVideo
RefreshUploadVideo.summary: Obtains a new upload credential after a file failed to be uploaded.

RefreshVodObjectCaches.title: RefreshVodObjectCaches
RefreshVodObjectCaches.summary: Refreshes files on Alibaba Cloud CDN nodes. You can refresh multiple files at a time based on URLs.

RegisterMedia.title: RegisterMedia
RegisterMedia.summary: Registers media files. After you add an Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket to ApsaraVideo VOD, you must register the media files in the bucket to generate the required information before you use features such as transcoding and snapshot capture on the media files.

SearchMedia.title: SearchMedia
SearchMedia.summary: Queries information about videos, audio, images, and auxiliary media assets. You can call this operation and specify the search protocol to query media assets based on the return fields, fields used for exact match, fields used for fuzzy match, fields used for a multi-value query, fields used for a range query, and sort fields.

SetAuditSecurityIp.title: SetAuditSecurityIp
SetAuditSecurityIp.summary: Sets IP addresses in review security groups.

SetCrossdomainContent.title: SetCrossdomainContent
SetCrossdomainContent.summary: Updates the cross-domain policy file crossdomain.xml.

SetDefaultAITemplate.title: SetDefaultAITemplate
SetDefaultAITemplate.summary: Specifies an AI template as the default template.

SetDefaultTranscodeTemplateGroup.title: SetDefaultTranscodeTemplateGroup
SetDefaultTranscodeTemplateGroup.summary: Specifies a transcoding template group as the default one.

SetDefaultWatermark.title: SetDefaultWatermark
SetDefaultWatermark.summary: Sets a watermark template as the default one.

SetEditingProjectMaterials.title: SetEditingProjectMaterials
SetEditingProjectMaterials.summary: Specifies the media assets that you want to edit in an online editing project.

SetMessageCallback.title: SetMessageCallback
SetMessageCallback.summary: Sets the callback method, callback URL, and event type of an event notification.

SetVodDomainCertificate.title: SetVodDomainCertificate
SetVodDomainCertificate.summary: Enables or disables the certificate of a domain name and modifies the certificate information.

SetVodDomainSSLCertificate.title: SetVodDomainSSLCertificate
SetVodDomainSSLCertificate.summary: Enables or disables the SSL certificate of a domain name and updates the certificate information.

SubmitAIImageAuditJob.title: SubmitAIImageAuditJob
SubmitAIImageAuditJob.summary: Submits an automated review job for an image. After the job is submitted, the job is processed in an asynchronous manner. The operation may return a response before the job is complete.

SubmitAIImageJob.title: SubmitAIImageJob
SubmitAIImageJob.summary: Submits jobs of image AI processing.

SubmitAIJob.title: SubmitAIJob
SubmitAIJob.summary: Submits a smart tagging or video fingerprinting job.

SubmitAIMediaAuditJob.title: SubmitAIMediaAuditJob
SubmitAIMediaAuditJob.summary: Submits an automated review job for a media file. After the job is submitted, ApsaraVideo VOD asynchronously processes the job. Therefore, the operation may return a response before the job is complete.

SubmitDigitalWatermarkExtractJob.title: SubmitDigitalWatermarkExtractJob
SubmitDigitalWatermarkExtractJob.summary: Submits a digital watermark extraction job. You can call this operation to asynchronously extract a copyright watermark or user-tracing watermark.

SubmitDynamicImageJob.title: SubmitDynamicImageJob
SubmitDynamicImageJob.summary: Submits a frame animation job and starts asynchronous processing.

SubmitPreprocessJobs.title: SubmitPreprocessJobs
SubmitPreprocessJobs.summary: Transcodes a video by using the production studio.

SubmitSnapshotJob.title: SubmitSnapshotJob
SubmitSnapshotJob.summary: Submits a snapshot job for a video and starts asynchronous snapshot processing.

SubmitTranscodeJobs.title: SubmitTranscodeJobs
SubmitTranscodeJobs.summary: Submits a transcoding job to start transcoding in an asynchronous manner.

SubmitWorkflowJob.title: SubmitWorkflowJob
SubmitWorkflowJob.summary: Initiates a workflow to process media files.

UpdateAppInfo.title: UpdateAppInfo
UpdateAppInfo.summary: Updates the information about an application.

UpdateAttachedMediaInfos.title: UpdateAttachedMediaInfos
UpdateAttachedMediaInfos.summary: Modifies the information about multiple auxiliary media assets at a time. After you upload auxiliary media assets, such as images that contain watermarks, subtitle files, or other materials, to ApsaraVideo VOD, you can call this operation to update their titles, descriptions, tags, and categories at a time based on the unique identifiers (IDs) of the auxiliary media assets.

UpdateImageInfos.title: UpdateImageInfos
UpdateImageInfos.summary: Modifies the information about multiple images at a time. After you upload images to ApsaraVideo VOD, you can call this operation to update their titles, descriptions, tags, and categories at a time based on the IDs of the images.

UpdateMediaStorageClass.title: UpdateMediaStorageClass
UpdateMediaStorageClass.summary: Modifies the storage classes of media assets.

UpdateTranscodeTemplateGroup.title: UpdateTranscodeTemplateGroup
UpdateTranscodeTemplateGroup.summary: Modifies the configurations of a transcoding template group or configurations of transcoding templates in the transcoding template group.

UpdateVideoInfo.title: UpdateVideoInfo
UpdateVideoInfo.summary: Modifies the information about an audio or video file.

UpdateVideoInfos.title: UpdateVideoInfos
UpdateVideoInfos.summary: Modifies information about multiple audio or video files at a time.

UpdateVodDomain.title: UpdateVodDomain
UpdateVodDomain.summary: Modifies a specific accelerated domain name.

UpdateWatermark.title: UpdateWatermark
UpdateWatermark.summary: Modifies the name and configurations of a watermark template after you create a watermark template.

UploadMediaByURL.title: UploadMediaByURL
UploadMediaByURL.summary: Uploads media files based on URLs.

UploadStreamByURL.title: UploadStreamByURL
UploadStreamByURL.summary: Uploads transcoded streams to ApsaraVideo VOD from external storage.

VerifyVodDomainOwner.title: VerifyVodDomainOwner
VerifyVodDomainOwner.summary: Verifies the ownership of a specified domain name.
